Description: Epiphone 50th Anniversary 1962 Sheraton E212TN Item Description Anniversary model of Sheraton, commemorating the 50th anniversary from 1962 when the transition from new york pickup at the time of release to mini humbucker pickup was completed. Unlike the current Sheraton such as a headstock with a corner, a center block, a mini humbucker, Frequensator tailpiece, a special one with a feeling of luxury and vintage! 【SPEC】 Body : Maple Neck : Mahogany Fingerboard : Rosewood Pickups : HH Weight : 3.51kg Color : Natural Serial Number : 12121500834 Condition: Used Although there are fine scratches, there is no noticeable big damage and the state is generally good. There is a slight wear and tear of the frets, but there is no problem on the current performance. There are dullness in metal parts. Certificate, various printed materials, genuine hard case is attached. There are slight scratches such as scratches in the hard case. ■ Fret residue: 70% to 80% ■ Neck state: almost straight ■ Truss rod: with margin All Electronics/Hardware function as they should. There is a few cosmetic damages like scratches, marks/dents and rusts on the metal parts. Please understand that this is a secondhand item. Ready to play when you get. ※ Epiphone items can be offered from us. ※ Please feel free to contact us if you have any question. I may be able to find for you if the item you are looking for is not on my online shop. Please feel free to contact me.
